app.name: Indlela
app.tagline: Tsela e Eang Tshebetsong e Ntle

common.error: Ho na le se sa tsamayang hantle
common.offline_message: Likarolo tse ling li ka nna tsa ba le meeli

auth.tagline: Hokahana le bafani ba litšebeletso ba tšepahalang
auth.footer_text: Ka ho tsoela pele, u lumela Melaoana ea Tšebeletso ea rona
auth.phone_hint: Re tla u romella khoutu ea netefatso
auth.otp_subtitle: Re romeletse khoutu ea linomoro tse 6 ho {phone}
auth.otp_help_text: Ha ua fumana khoutu? Sheba li-SMS tsa hau kapa kopa e ncha.
auth.logout_message: Na u na le bonnete ba hore u batla ho tsoa ak'haonteng ea hau?

home.no_providers_message: Ha re a fumana bafani sebakeng sa hau. Leka ho atolosa lipatlisiso tsa hau.
home.ai_assistant_title: U hloka thuso ho fumana tšebeletso?
home.ai_assistant_message: Motlatsi oa rona oa AI a ka u thusa ho fumana mofani oa tšebeletso ea nepahetseng.

booking.title: Pukiso
booking.cancel_confirm: Na u na le bonnete ba hore u batla ho hlakola pukiso ena?

empty.title: Ha ho na Lipukiso Hajoale
empty.message: Nalane ea lipukiso tsa hau e tla hlaha mona
empty.upcoming_title: Ha ho na Lipukiso Tse Tlang
empty.upcoming_message: Ha u na lipukiso tse hlophisitsoeng. Sheba litšebeletso ho buka mofani.
empty.past_title: Ha ho na Lipukiso Tse Fetileng
empty.past_message: Lipukiso tsa hau tse phethiloeng le tse hlakotseng li tla hlaha mona.

review.title: Tekanya Boiphihlelo ba Hau
review.how_was_service: Tšebeletso e ne e le joang?
review.comment_placeholder: Bolella ba bang ka boiphihlelo ba hau...
review.thank_you: Rea leboha ka maikutlo a hau!

settings.title: Litlhophiso
settings.name: Lebitso
settings.provider_description: Laola litšebeletso tsa hau le meputso ea hau

errors.network: Phoso ea marang-rang. Ka kopo hlahloba khokahano ea hau.
errors.server: Phoso ea seva. Ka kopo leka hape hamorao.
errors.invalid_phone: Ka kopo kenya nomoro ea mohala ea Afrika Boroa e amohelehang
errors.invalid_otp: Khoutu ea netefatso e fosahetseng. Ka kopo leka hape.
errors.otp_expired: Khoutu ea netefatso e felile. Ka kopo kopa e ncha.
errors.rate_limited: Maiteko a mangata haholo. Ka kopo ema metsotso e 'maloa.
errors.unauthorized: Ka kopo kena ho tsoela pele
errors.forbidden: Ha u na tumello ea ho etsa sena
errors.booking_failed: Ho buka ho hlolehile. Ka kopo leka hape.
errors.location_denied: Ho fumana sebaka ho hanantsoe. Ka kopo lumella litšebeletso tsa sebaka.

validation.phone_format: Ka kopo kenya nomoro ea mohala e nepahetseng
validation.min_length: E tlameha ho ba bonyane litlhaku tse {min}
validation.max_length: E tlameha ho ba bongata litlhaku tse {max}
